name: Magical Girl Priscilla: Phoenix Clicker
description:
Play with a mouse or touchscreen.

Priscilla's pet Phoenix has returned an egg after a devastating battle and Priscilla is determined to break her out! Help the gang click their way to victory in 4 timed rounds in which the gang goes to space and beyond to try to hatch Phoenix and repopulate the universe!

Made for the 2022 IGMC Game Jam.
